response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which we believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, we estimate its worth to be $1,200,000 to us. However, considering your specific needs and the potential benefits it could bring to you, we are offering this remarkable opportunity at a special price tailored just for you. We propose to sell the product to you for $950,000. This offer includes all the features you're looking for, along with a comprehensive support package to ensure a smooth integration into your existing systems. We believe this is an excellent opportunity for both parties to achieve mutual success. Please let us know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with this exclusive offer.", "product_price": 950000}
